entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

Temperature: -29.0°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
